mapper.select: select b.id,b.name,categoryId,unitId,salePrice,specification,warning,b.createBy,b.createTime,b.updateBy,b.updateTime, un.name as unitName,mc.name as categoryName, c.userName as createByName,u.userName as updateByName from base_medicine b LEFT JOIN sys_user c on b.createBy=c.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user u on b.updateBy=u.userId, base_unit un,base_medicine_category mc where b.categoryId=mc.id and b.unitId=un.id and b.isDel=0 and c.isDel=0 and u.isDel=0 and un.isDel=0 and mc.isDel=0 and b.id=#{id} and b.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and categoryId=#{categoryId} and specification like concat('%',#{specification},'%') and unitId=#{unitId}

SELECT b.*,o.quantity,o.totalPrice,o.code,o.providerId,bpt.type AS providerName, b.createBy,b.createTime,b.updateBy,b.updateTime, un.name as unitName,mc.name as categoryName, getMedicineListByCode as createByName, (SELECT userName FROM sys_user u WHERE b.updateBy=u.userId) as updateByName, p.price AS purchasePrice, o.sourceCode,o.id as medicineOrderId from base_medicine b, base_unit un,base_medicine_category mc,order_medicine o,base_provider bp,base_provider_type bpt,provider_medicine p where o.medicineId=b.id and b.categoryId=mc.id and b.unitId=un.id and o.providerId = bp.id and bp.type = bpt.id and b.isDel=0 and un.isDel=0 and mc.isDel=0 and p.providerId = o.providerId and o.medicineId = p.medicineId # FROM base_medicine m,order_medicine o # WHERE o.medicineId=m.id AND o.code=#{code}

select DISTINCT b.id,b.name,categoryId,unitId,salePrice,specification,warning,b.createBy,b.createTime,b.updateBy,b.updateTime, un.name as unitName,mc.name as categoryName, c.userName as createByName,u.userName as updateByName, p.price AS purchasePrice from base_medicine b LEFT JOIN sys_user c on b.createBy=c.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user u on b.updateBy=u.userId, base_unit un,base_medicine_category mc,provider_medicine p where b.categoryId=mc.id and b.unitId=un.id and b.isDel=0 and c.isDel=0 and u.isDel=0 and un.isDel=0 and mc.isDel=0 AND p.medicineId=b.id AND p.providerId=#{providerId}

select DISTINCT b.id,b.name,categoryId,unitId,salePrice,specification,warning,b.createBy,b.createTime,b.updateBy,b.updateTime, c.userName as createByName,u.userName as updateByName, un.name as unitName,mc.name as categoryName,k.quantity as stock from base_medicine b LEFT JOIN sys_user c on b.createBy=c.userId LEFT JOIN sys_user u on b.updateBy=u.userId, base_unit un,base_medicine_category mc,kc_medicine k where b.categoryId=mc.id and b.unitId=un.id and k.medicineId=b.id and b.isDel=0 and c.isDel=0 and u.isDel=0 and un.isDel=0 and mc.isDel=0 and k.isDel=0 and b.id=#{id} and k.batchCode=#{batchCode}
select DISTINCT base_medicine.* FROM base_medicine,kc_medicine where kc_medicine.medicineId=base_medicine.id and storehouseId=1
select kc_medicine.* FROM kc_medicine where medicineId=#{medicineId}

SELECT b.*,o.quantity,o.totalPrice,o.code,o.providerId,bpt.type AS providerName, b.createBy,b.createTime,b.updateBy,b.updateTime, un.name as unitName,mc.name as categoryName, (SELECT userName FROM sys_user u WHERE b.createBy=u.userId) as createByName, (SELECT userName FROM sys_user u WHERE b.updateBy=u.userId) as updateByName, p.price AS purchasePrice, o.sourceCode,o.id as medicineOrderId from base_medicine b, base_unit un,base_medicine_category mc,order_medicine o,base_provider bp,base_provider_type bpt,provider_medicine p where o.medicineId=b.id and b.categoryId=mc.id and b.unitId=un.id and o.providerId = bp.id and bp.type = bpt.id and b.isDel=0 and un.isDel=0 and mc.isDel=0 and p.providerId = o.providerId and o.medicineId = p.medicineId # FROM base_medicine m,order_medicine o # WHERE o.medicineId=m.id AND o.code=#{code}
select DISTINCT * FROM base_medicine where isDel=0
